"Wired Lance":
"Wired Lances are melee weapons with a wide attack range, which can deal extra damage by striking enemies with the tip.

The Class Skill \"Wired Anchor Advance\" changes the behavior of their Weapon Action based on your directional input."

"The PA \"Cutting Layer\" can enemies in a wide area in front of you all at once.

You can't move during the attack, so be aware of your situation before you use it."
